This script is to create mixed effect linear regression models for body condition indices for black-tailed deer inside the burn perimeter.

```{r}
packages <- c('lme4','MuMIn','here','dplyr','car','ggplot2')

install_load <- function(packages){
     for (p in packages) {
          if (p %in% rownames(installed.packages())) {
               library(p, character.only=TRUE)
          } else {
               install.packages(p)
               library(p,character.only = TRUE)
          }
     }
}

install_load(packages)
```

```{r}
# Import data
bci.all <- read.csv(here::here("Publication_Data","Camera","BCI_All_cleaned.csv"))

# scale continuous variables
bci.all$time.since.fire.scaled <- scale(bci.all$time.since.fire, center=T, scale=T)
bci.all$time.since.fire.noneg.scaled <- scale(bci.all$time.since.fire.noneg, center=T, scale=T)

# split into buck and doe data frames for modeling
bci.doe <- bci.all[bci.all$Species=="Deer - Doe",]
bci.buck <- bci.all[bci.all$Species=="Deer - Buck",]
```


```{r}
# model testing

# DOE MODELS

null <- lmer(BCI ~ (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(null) # 2996.093

# univariate models
fit1 <- lmer(BCI ~ TimePeriod + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(fit1) # 2944.632
fit2 <- lmer(BCI ~ time.since.fire.noneg.scaled + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(fit2) # 2972.433
fit3 <- lmer(BCI ~ Area + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(fit3) # 2997.672

# models with time and area interaction terms
fit4 <- lmer(BCI ~ TimePeriod * Area + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(fit4) # 2939.625 - THE BEST MODEL
summary(fit4)
r.squaredGLMM(fit4) # Rc = 0.29

fit5 <- lmer(BCI ~ Area * time.since.fire.noneg.scaled + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
AIC(fit5) # 2976.886
summary(fit5)

# trying a model with all three - too much correlation
fit7 <- lmer(BCI ~ TimePeriod * Area + time.since.fire.noneg.scaled + (1|Station), data = bci.doe)
vif(fit7) # TimePeriod and time are too highly correlated


# BUCK MODELS - null model is the best model

null <- lmer(BCI ~ (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(null) # 951.4633

# univariate models
fit1 <- lmer(BCI ~ TimePeriod + (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(fit1) # 956.2521
fit2 <- lmer(BCI ~ time.since.fire.noneg.scaled + (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(fit2) # 956.0953
fit3 <- lmer(BCI ~ Area + (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(fit3) # 954.2583

# models with time and area interaction terms
fit4 <- lmer(BCI ~ TimePeriod * Area + (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(fit4) # 962.4327
summary(fit4)
fit5 <- lmer(BCI ~ Area * time.since.fire.noneg.scaled + (1|Station), data = bci.buck)
AIC(fit5) # 963.7604
summary(fit5)
```
